xuk.fixed_incom.ytm#

Module Contents#

Classes#

YTM

class YTM[source]#
coupon_bond(fv: int | float, pv: int | float, coupon_rate: float, maturity_date: datetime.date, period: int, adjust_pv: bool = True)[source]#

Calculates yield to maturity for coupon bonds.

بازده-تا-سررسید را برای اوراقِ کپن-دار محاسبه می‌کند.

Note

Note that the output amount is based on the coupon payment period. For example, if the cap period is 3 months, the yield-to-maturity is 3 months (!) which should be converted to annual.

Note

توجه شود که مقدار خروجیِ بر اساسِ دوره‌یِ پرداختِ کپن است.

برای نمونه اگر دوره‌یِ کپن 3 ماهه باشد، بازده-تا-سررسید 3 ماهه است(!) که باید به سالانه تبدیل شود.

Parameters:

  • fv (int) – future value paid at maturity, or the par value of the bond

  • pv (int or float) – present value, or the price of the bond

  • coupon_rate (float) – nominal yield

  • maturity_date (datetime.date) – bond maturity date

  • period (int) – coupon period (*number of months*)

  • adjust_pv (bool) – It depends on the market. If the yield of the coupon due to the days that have passed until the day of the transaction is paid separately, it should be entered True, otherwise it should be entered False. Default: True

Returns:

yield-to-maturity

Return type:

float

Examples

Import libraries

>>> import datetime
>>> from xuk.fixed_incom import YTM

>>> datetime.date.today()
datetime.date(2023, 10, 13)
>>> YTM().coupon_bond(fv=100, pv=98, coupon_rate=0.09,maturity_date= datetime.date(2024,6,2), period=6)
0.10675403744515967
zero_coupon_bond(fv: int | float, pv: int | float, n: int)[source]#

Calculates yield to maturity for zero-coupon bonds.

بازده-تا-سررسید را برای اوراقِ بدونِ-کپن محاسبه می‌کند.

Note

بازده-تا-سررسید سالانه است!

Note

yield-to-maturity is annum!

Parameters:

  • fv (int or float) – future value paid at maturity, or the par value of the bond

  • pv (int or float) – present value, or the price of the bond

  • n (int) – number of days to maturity

Returns:

yield-to-maturity

Return type:

float

Examples

Import libraries

>>> from xuk.fixed_incom import YTM

>>> YTM().zero_coupon_bond(fv=100, pv=73, n=543)
0.23558667358353835
